text: R. P. M. is a 1970 American drama movie directed by Stanley Kramer, written by Erich Segal and starring Anthony Quinn, Ann-Margaret, Gary Lockwood, Paul Winfield, Graham Jarvis. It was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1970 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies directed by Stanley Kramer
title: R. P. M.
